title: Serious Teamrank! Looking for Midlaner and Supporter. Master-Dia.
body:
We are currently looking for a Midlaner and Supporter.
Our goals are, practicing 4 times minimum per week, and participating at LoL Tourneys.

You need :
Teamspeak
Gameexperience
Communication

If you are interested add **FreNaxe**

replies.body:
Hi,
Im currently plat 3 and main midlane. Yes, im not dia or master but if u want u can add me and play few games with me so i can maybe show u that im good enof. I few weeks ill be dia anyway so maybe we can make a team now.
